document_data.name: Tempest
document_data.deathnotes: (Stabbed through the left breast with a poisoned [[dagger]] by assassins in Waterdeep)
document_data.source: |[[Jane Cooper Hong]], ''[[Pool of Radiance (novel)|Pool of Radiance]]''
document_data.text: ''Her hair was the flaming sienna red of bur oak leaves in autumn.''
document_data.mainbody: Bawdy and quick as a [[courtesan (prostitute)|street courtesan]], Tempest was wonderfully talented in all her exploits.
document_data.Description: Tempest was a very beautiful and muscular woman with fiery red hair.
document_data.Possessions: When hunting and stealing, Tempest preferred to wear black [[leather armor]].
document_data.History:
In [[1339 DR]], Ren and Tempest stole a pair of magical [[dagger]]s and [[ioun stone]]s from an assassin's guild in [[Waterdeep]].

Later that year, the killers found Ren and Tempest in their Waterdhavian home and stabbed Tempest through her left breast.
